Summary: Light floating above horizon flashing colour redi-orange white disapearing and reapearing.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Ladybrand
There were no other sightings in Ladybrand on or around November 12th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailsgot ready to go to bed went outside for a look at the stars major thunderstorm just passed(always do since last time also in november much more exciting) noticed a bright starlike light west above the horizon it did not move bright then disappeared then 2 sec appeared, went red orange then disappeared then 2 sec appeared, went red orange and white on off for about 15min got tired and went to bed
